plot: Algie Allmore has one year to prove he's a man in order to wed Harry Lyons' daughter.
title: Algie, the Miner
plot_es: Algie Allmore has one year to prove he's a man in order to wed Harry Lyons' daughter.
plot_en: Algie Allmore has one year to prove he's a man in order to wed Harry Lyons' daughter.
